name: Oddish
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sprout
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon named Oddish and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can’t use this attack if your Bench is full.)
